Sentencas: The concept of hybrid microgrid (MG) has attracted tremendous attention in modern electricity markets, owing to the enhanced efficiency and reliability it offers to the main electricity grid.
Titulo: Enhancing Power Quality in PV-SOFC Microgrids Using Improved Particle Swarm Optimization

Sentencas: Numerous meritorious aspects associated with hybrid MGs are the key features of future large scale renewable technologies.
Titulo: Enhancing Power Quality in PV-SOFC Microgrids Using Improved Particle Swarm Optimization

Sentencas: In this paper, a hybrid MG using PV-SOFC (PhotoVoltaic - Solid Oxide Fuel Cell) is connected to an infinite bus bar, in order to achieve an autonomous working mode.
Titulo: Enhancing Power Quality in PV-SOFC Microgrids Using Improved Particle Swarm Optimization

Sentencas: The dynamic and steady-state operation with control strategies for both PV and SOFC power systems are analyzed.
Titulo: Enhancing Power Quality in PV-SOFC Microgrids Using Improved Particle Swarm Optimization

Sentencas: The objective is to control the voltage and frequency of the MG when it is not connected to the main grid.
Titulo: Enhancing Power Quality in PV-SOFC Microgrids Using Improved Particle Swarm Optimization

Sentencas: Typically, an efficient control strategy must assess the power conversion system and its state, in the isolated MG.
Titulo: Enhancing Power Quality in PV-SOFC Microgrids Using Improved Particle Swarm Optimization

Sentencas: Moreover, it must reliably handle variant and intermittent type of loads.
Titulo: Enhancing Power Quality in PV-SOFC Microgrids Using Improved Particle Swarm Optimization

Sentencas: With this viewpoint, we propose a Voltage Source Inverter (VSI) based Proportional Integral (PI) controller, optimized by Improved Particle Swarm Optimization (IPSO) for the purpose of smooth power flow control improving power quality.
Titulo: Enhancing Power Quality in PV-SOFC Microgrids Using Improved Particle Swarm Optimization

Sentencas: The performance of PI-IPSO and PI technologies are evaluated, for the proposed MG, in MATLAB/Simulink
Titulo: Enhancing Power Quality in PV-SOFC Microgrids Using Improved Particle Swarm Optimization

Sentencas: The results obtained verify the effectiveness of the modified PSO algorithm, in comparison to the conventional PI techniques, for the frequency and voltage control of the MG.
Titulo: Enhancing Power Quality in PV-SOFC Microgrids Using Improved Particle Swarm Optimization
